Arch shares its wiki strategy with Debian

Arch Linux has decided to share its wiki strategy with Debian, aiming for a more collaborative and unified approach in documentation.

  • Project/Component: Arch Linux Wiki Strategy
  • Target Architecture: N/A (not specific to any architecture)
  • Optimization/IR/Pass Name: N/A (no optimization or pass mentioned)
  • Version/Release: N/A (no version or release information provided)
  • Regression/Performance Impact: No direct performance impact discussed, but potential improvements in documentation collaboration
  • Related PR/Commit/Discussion Links: https://lwn.net/Articles/1032604/

影响：This move is expected to enhance the quality and accessibility of documentation for both Arch Linux and Debian users.

Intel ISPC 1.28 Adds Optimized Support For AMD Zen 4 & Zen 5 CPUs

ISPC 1.28 brings some minor language changes, now supports ISPC usage as a C++ library for embedding ISPC compilation directly into applications, Python integration enhancements, new standard library functions and more vector types, and various optimizations and fixes.

  • Supports AMD Zen 4 & Zen 5 CPUs
  • ISPC-as-a-Library support with experimental JIT compilation
  • Optimized shuffle / shift / rotate and reduce_equal on AVX-512 targets up to a 90% speed-up
  • New standard library functions and more vector types

影响：Improved performance for AMD Zen 4 & Zen 5 CPUs, enhanced integration capabilities with C++ and Python.

ISPCAMD Zen 4AMD Zen 5AVX-512JIT compilationC++ libraryPython integration

https://www.phoronix.com/news/Intel-ISPC-1.28

Linux Preps For New "SoC Power Slider" With Upcoming Panther Lake

The Linux kernel is preparing for a new feature called the SoC Power Slider, which will be introduced with Panther Lake hardware. This feature missed inclusion in Linux 6.17 and will not be part of Ubuntu 25.10.

  • SoC Power Slider is a system-wide energy performance preferences interface
  • Piggy-backs off the Linux platform profile API
  • Three power profiles: 'performance', 'balanced', and 'low-power'
  • Defined via processor thermal PCI device MMIO space

影响：The SoC Power Slider feature missed inclusion in Linux 6.17, which is unfortunate since it will be the kernel powering Ubuntu 25.10.

Linux KernelPanther LakeSoC Power SliderEnergy Performance Preferences InterfacePlatform Profile API

https://www.phoronix.com/news/Intel-Panther-Lake-Power-Slider

Rust Project Goals Update

The Rust project is working towards a slate of 40 goals with three flagship goals focused on improving support for asynchronous programming.

  • Project aims to improve async programming in Rust, including async closures and generators.
  • Dynosaur crate development for dynamic dispatch of async functions in traits.
  • Improving ergonomics of Pin for lower-level async coding.
  • Async-fn-in-traits support will subsume the functionality of the async-trait crate.

影响：These updates are expected to enhance Rust's capabilities and ease of use for asynchronous programming, making it more accessible and efficient for developers.

Rustasync programmingdynosaur cratePin ergonomicsasync-fn-in-traits

https://blog.rust-lang.org/2025/05/26/april-project-goals-update/https://blog.rust-lang.org/2025/08/05/july-project-goals-update/https://blog.rust-lang.org/2025/06/20/may-project-goals-update/

Hashimoto Rewrites Ghostty GTK Application

Mitchell Hashimoto has rewritten the Ghostty GTK application to fully embrace the GObject type system, leading to improvements in memory management and easier creation of custom GTK widgets.

  • Project/Component: Ghostty GTK application
  • Target Architecture: Not specified but implied to be compatible with modern GTK UI technologies
  • Optimization/IR/Pass Name: Embracing GObject type system, Blueprint technology usage
  • Version/Release: Expected in the 1.2 release coming in the next few weeks
  • Regression/Performance Impact: Memory management improvements and easier introduction of GUI features like new titlebar tabs option and animated border on bell
  • Related PR/Commit/Discussion Links: https://lwn.net/Articles/1033954/

影响：The rewrite has led to more easily introducing GUI features such as a new GTK titlebar tabs option, an animated border on bell, and better memory management.

GhosttyGTKGObject type systemBlueprint technology

https://lwn.net/Articles/1033954/

KDE Gear 25.08 Released With Improvements For Many KDE Apps

The KDE Gear 25.08 release includes several improvements for various KDE applications, such as Akonadi, Dolphin file manager, KRFB, Neochat, and the KDE Itinerary travel app.

  • Akonadi engine memory usage reduced by up to 75%
  • Better integration with Microsoft InTune enterprise authentication service
  • Improvements to the Dolphin file manager
  • KRFB now supports non-European alphabets for desktop sharing
  • Neochat program allows creating polls for Matrix chat support
  • KDE Itinerary travel app lets users manually enter their train or bus trips

影响：The release improves performance and adds new features to various KDE applications, enhancing user experience.

KDE GearAkonadiDolphin file managerKRFBNeochatKDE Itinerary

https://kde.org/https://www.phoronix.com/news/KDE-Gear-25.08

VirtualBox 7.2 Released With Windows 11 ARM Support, Linux 6.16 Compatibility

VirtualBox 7.2 introduces support for running on Windows 11 ARM as both the host and guest platform with Guest Additions. It also includes user interface improvements, compatibility updates for the Linux 6.16 kernel, enhancements to Windows Hyper-V integration, and various fixes.

  • Project/Component: VirtualBox
  • Target Architecture: Windows 11 ARM (host and guest support)
  • Optimization/IR/Pass Name: User interface improvements, Guest Additions for Windows 11 on Arm guests
  • Version/Release: 7.2
  • Regression/Performance Impact: No specific regressions noted; includes various fixes and improvements
  • Related PR/Commit/Discussion Links: https://www.phoronix.com/news/VirtualBox-7.2-Released

影响：Enhances compatibility with newer platforms (Windows 11 ARM) and kernels (Linux 6.16), improves user experience through interface enhancements, and integrates better with Windows Hyper-V.

VirtualBoxWindows 11 ARMLinux Kernel CompatibilityUser Interface ImprovementsHyper-V Integration

https://www.phoronix.com/news/VirtualBox-7.2-Released

AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO 9995WX Performance With TRX50 + Quad Channel DDR5

The newly-launched AMD Ryzen Threadripper 9000 series, including the flagship 64-core Threadripper 9980X and 32-core Threadripper 9970X, offers significant performance improvements. The Threadripper PRO 9995WX, with its 96 cores, is evaluated on a TRX50 platform using quad channel DDR5-6400 memory.

  • Threadripper PRO 9995WX features 96 cores
  • Performance evaluation on TRX50 platform with quad channel DDR5-6400 memory
  • WRX90 motherboards support eight-channel memory and provide more PCIe Gen 5 lanes compared to TRX50

影响：The Threadripper PRO 9995WX offers a significant performance boost for high-end desktop (HEDT) users, especially when paired with WRX90 motherboards that support up to eight-channel memory and provide more PCIe Gen 5 lanes.

AMD Ryzen Threadripper PROThreadripper PRO 9995WXTRX50 platformquad channel DDR5WRX9 motherboardsHEDT performance

https://www.phoronix.com/review/amd-threadripper-9995wx-trx50

Rust 1.89.0 发布公告

Rust 团队宣布了 Rust 的新版本 1.89.0。这是一个编程语言，旨在让每个人都能构建可靠且高效的软件。

  • 支持在 const 泛型参数中使用 _ 来从周围上下文中推断值
  • 不允许可变泛型参数在签名中的使用

影响：增加了对显式推导的 const 泛型参数的支持，提升了代码编写灵活性。

Rustconst genericsversion 1.89.0

https://blog.rust-lang.org/2025/08/07/Rust-1.89.0/

Generic VFIO Platform Driver To Be Marked As Deprecated For Removal

Red Hat engineer Alex Williamson, who is the upstream maintainer of VFIO support and related pieces of the Linux virtualization stack, has posted patches to begin deprecating some unmaintained code.

  • vfio-fsl-mc driver has been orphaned since April 2024 after the maintainer became unresponsive
  • The vfio-platform and vfio-amba drivers have an active maintainer but no ability to test these drivers anymore due to hardware obsolescence
  • Eric's efforts to add support for new devices and manage shared resources at KVM Forum 2024 did not advance the state of the driver or its testing capabilities

影响：The vfio-fsl-mc, vfio-platform, and vfio-amba drivers are being marked as obsolete/deprecated due to lack of maintenance and hardware obsolescence.

VFIOLinux virtualization stackdriver deprecationRed HatAlex Williamsonvfio-fsl-mcvfio-platformvfio-amba

https://www.phoronix.com/news/VFIO-Platform-Deprecated

Linux 6.18 With Nouveau Driver Will Default To Using GSP Firmware

The Nouveau driver beginning on the Linux 6.18 kernel will begin using the GPU System Processor (GSP) firmware by default but still have a fallback in place in case that firmware isn't supported.

  • Nouveau driver defaults to GSP firmware starting from Linux 6.18
  • Fallback available if GSP firmware is not supported
  • NVIDIA GSP firmware on RTX 20 GPUs and newer recommended for best experience with Nouveau driver

影响：This change aims to improve the default behavior of the Nouveau driver by leveraging better-tested paths, potentially enhancing performance and stability.

LinuxNouveau DriverGSP FirmwareGPU System ProcessorRTX 20 GPUsFedoraCTS Testing

https://www.phoronix.com/news/Nouveau-GSP-Default

AMDXDNA Improvements & New Rockchip NPU Accelerator Driver For Linux 6.18

The drm-misc-next pull for the Linux 6.18 cycle includes improvements to AMDXDNA and introduces a new open-source driver for the Rockchip NPU accelerator.

  • Nouveau driver defaults to using NVIDIA GSP firmware for Turing and Ampere GPUs
  • Rocket, an open-source reverse-engineered Rockchip NPU driver, is merging into the mainline kernel with Linux 6.18
  • User-space support ready for Mesa 25.3 atop the Teflon framework

影响：Improves experience for open-source NVIDIA users and expands the accelerator subsystem area in the Linux kernel.

Linux KernelNVIDIA GSP FirmwareRockchip NPU Accelerator DriverRocket DriverTeflon FrameworkMesa 25.3

https://www.phoronix.com/news/DRM-Misc-Next-Linux-6.18

Ubuntu 25.10 Enters Its Feature Freeze Period

With the beginning of the feature freeze, the Ubuntu development focus shifts primarily to testing and fixing bugs ahead of the anticipated 9 October release date. But feature freeze exceptions can be granted for those developers with late features to land. New point releases of software that don't introduce new features can also continue to land.

  • Ubuntu 25.10 is powered by the Linux 6.17 kernel
  • Features GNOME 49 desktop atop Wayland
  • Ups RISC-V support baseline to the RVA23 profile
  • Gets TPM-backed full disk encryption support
  • Includes sudo-rs and other Rust-based components
  • Chrony is used by default
  • Dracut is now being used by default

影响：The feature freeze period marks a shift in focus towards testing and bug fixing, with the aim of ensuring stability ahead of the release date.

UbuntuLinux KernelGNOMEWaylandRISC-VTPM-backed Encryptionsudo-rsChronyDracut

https://www.phoronix.com/news/Ubuntu-25.10-Feature-Freeze

SR-IOV Support Limited to Intel Arc Pro Graphics Cards

The support for Single Root I/O Virtualization (SR-IOV) is limited to the professional line of Intel's Battlemage discrete graphics processors, specifically the Arc Pro products. This decision comes despite earlier hopes from Linux users that SR-IOV would be available on consumer models like the Arc B580 and Arc B570.

  • SR-IOV support is limited to Intel Arc Pro Graphics Cards
  • Enabled in upstream for Linux kernel version 6.17 with Xe driver
  • Earlier hopes from users were that SR-IOV would be available on consumer Battlemage graphics cards like the Arc B580 and Arc B570 were not realized

影响：This decision impacts users who require SR-IOV for virtualization purposes, as they will need to use professional product SKUs from Intel.

SR-IOVIntel Arc Pro Graphics CardsBattlemage GPUsLinux Kernel 6.17Xe Driver

https://www.phoronix.com/news/Intel-SR-IOV-Only-For-Arc-Pro
